Core:PCProperties.Core:Property: "This command has combined 3 previous commands. It works as follows: \\r\\n\\r\\n \\n1.) Teleport/move into a specific object, specified by its name in the system. \\r\\n\\r\\n \\n2.) Teleport to another character or object.\\r\\n\\r\\n \\n3.) +go is used to store/return to areas. By prefixing the area name with a +, you are adding it to the list of go-able places. Omitting the + means you wish to go to the place previously defined as \.\\r\\n"

"3 examples based on the respective uses: \\r\\n\\r\\n \\n1.) +goto Kalle:rooms:bar\\r\\n Move into the room \ \\r\\n\\r\\n \\n2.) +go gelirn Join the character Geli.\\r\\n+go Marrach:players:K:kalle\\r\\n Join the object\\r\\n\\r\\n \\n3.) +go +kalle's home\\r\\n Adds the actor's current environment as \\"kalle's home\\"\\r\\n\\r\\n+go kalle's home\\r\\n Teleports to the area defined as \\"kalle's home\\".\\r\\n\\r\\n+go list\\r\\n Lists the available entries.\\r\\n\\r\\n+go -kalle's home\\r\\n Removes the entry named \\"kalle's home\\" from the +go list.\\r\\n\\r\\n+go ++kalle's home\\r\\n Overwrites the previous entry named \\"kalle's home\\" with a new one. Do not use this unless you're sure of what you're doing.\\r\\n\\r\\nNote that all entries are global for the server."
